title: Is there no way to change the client to korean now?
body: Listen i have something to say that is really pissing me on! no not off anyways on the new client in the current patch is there really no way to change the client to korean? This is not a big issue i know that but still I just want to play my game in korean. Before people said you cant change the client to korean because the new client isn't out in korea but im pretty sure its been out for a while. Any help would be useful.

replies.body: League is definitely out in Korea, but due to the way their laws work their client is separate from the usual one you use. As of right now, Korean is not a supported language on the NA server.
So what exactly changed? It was available on both the legacy and current client (last I tried was in Dec 2016)
Do you think we will ever get the chance to have a korean language on NA servers? If so when?

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eyqwZmJZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-29T21:48:23.732+0000)
>
> League is definitely out in Korea, but due to the way their laws work their client is separate from the usual one you use. As of right now, Korean is not a supported language on the NA server.

Please make it supported i'm trying to learn Korean :-(

Well u can change ur language doing that: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6dy3n6/since_alot_of_people_are_trying_to_change_there/
Just remember that patches are downloading at lower speed than normally. I was downloading it at about 3mb/s when usually its about 8mb/s so just remember u will not play league for next 2 hours for sure. But it works. I don't know if it's bannable or not, youre not using 3rd party programs, just league original files.
